options.content:
**Piano-Daten**

- Die Daten werden für die letzten abgeschlossenen Tage des gewählten Zeitraums angegeben.
- Der heutige Tag wird also nicht einbezogen.
- Daten können von Piano-Daten bei den Dashboards von AT Internet abweichen, wenn die Sophora-ID geändert wurde.
- App-Daten sind nicht enthalten, zu sehen sind nur die Web-Daten.

**GSC-Daten**

- Die neuesten Daten aus der Google Search Console sind grundsätzlich drei Tage alt, da Google keine aktuelleren Daten anbietet.
- Es fehlen also stets die Daten von heute, gestern und vorgestern.
- Betrachtet werden die letzten sieben Tage ab diesem Zeitpunkt.

**Vergleichbarkeit der Daten**

- In Piano wird der Traffic in Visits gezählt, in der Google Search Console in Klicks. Die zwei Metriken sind nicht identisch und weichen deshalb voneinander ab.

targets.rawSql:
WITH data_string AS(
  SELECT "$KPI_query" AS data
), split_rows AS (
  SELECT TRIM(REPLACE(part, "(", ""), ")") AS row_text
  FROM data_string,
  UNNEST(SPLIT(data, " -ni- ")) AS part
), parsed_rows AS (
  SELECT
    DATE(SPLIT(row_text, "|")[OFFSET(0)]) AS time,
    CAST(SPLIT(row_text, "|")[OFFSET(1)] AS FLOAT64) AS total,
    CAST(SPLIT(row_text, "|")[OFFSET(2)] AS FLOAT64) AS search,
    CAST(SPLIT(row_text, "|")[OFFSET(3)] AS FLOAT64) AS news,
    CAST(SPLIT(row_text, "|")[OFFSET(4)] AS FLOAT64) AS discover,
  FROM split_rows
)
SELECT
  *, CASE "$Zeitraum"
    WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "7 Tage"
    WHEN "Letzte 28 Tage" THEN "28 Tage"
    WHEN "Letzte 3 Monate" THEN "3 Monate"
    WHEN "Letzte 6 Monate" THEN "6 Monate"
  END AS timeRange
FROM
  parsed_rows
ORDER BY time
SELECt ' ' as value

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(value)), value)
FROM(
SELECT 'Clicks Total' as value
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(value)), value)
FROM(
SELECT 'Impressions Total' as value
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(value)), value)
FROM(
SELECT "CTR Total" as value
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(value)), value)
FROM(
SELECT "Total" as value
)

WITH data_string AS(
  SELECT "$KPI_query" AS data
), split_rows AS (
  SELECT TRIM(REPLACE(part, "(", ""), ")") AS row_text
  FROM data_string,
  UNNEST(SPLIT(data, " -ni- ")) AS part
), parsed_rows AS (
  SELECT
    DATE(SPLIT(row_text, "|")[OFFSET(0)]) AS data_date,
    CAST(SPLIT(row_text, "|")[OFFSET(1)] AS FLOAT64) AS clicks,
  FROM split_rows
)
SELECT
  SUM(clicks) as summe
FROM
  parsed_rows

WITH data_string AS(
  SELECT "$KPI_query" AS data
), split_rows AS (
  SELECT TRIM(REPLACE(part, "(", ""), ")") AS row_text
  FROM data_string,
  UNNEST(SPLIT(data, " -ni- ")) AS part
), parsed_rows AS (
  SELECT
    DATE(SPLIT(row_text, "|")[OFFSET(0)]) AS data_date,
    CAST(SPLIT(row_text, "|")[OFFSET(5)] AS FLOAT64) AS impressions,
  FROM split_rows

SELECT
  SUM(impressions) as summe
FROM
  parsed_rows

WITH data_string AS(
  SELECT "$KPI_query" AS data
), split_rows AS (
  SELECT TRIM(REPLACE(part, "(", ""), ")") AS row_text
  FROM data_string,
  UNNEST(SPLIT(data, " -ni- ")) AS part
), parsed_rows AS (
  SELECT
    DATE(SPLIT(row_text, "|")[OFFSET(0)]) AS data_date,
    CAST(SPLIT(row_text, "|")[OFFSET(9)] AS FLOAT64) AS CTR,
  FROM split_rows
)
SELECT
  AVG(CTR) as summe
FROM
  parsed_rows

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(value)), value)
FROM(
SELECT "Suche (Web, Bilder, Videos & News)" as value
)

SELECT " "

SELECT * EXCEPT(site_level2, page_chapter1, page_chapter2, rn, zeitraum) FROM SEO_scheduled_queries.top_web_articles
WHERE zeitraum = "$Zeitraum" AND site_level2 = "$LRA_mapping" AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen" AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
ORDER BY visits DESC
SELECT " "

SELECT * EXCEPT(site_level2, page_chapter1, page_chapter2, rn, zeitraum) FROM SEO_scheduled_queries.top_web_referrer
WHERE zeitraum = "$Zeitraum" AND site_level2 = "$LRA_mapping" AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen" AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
ORDER BY Visits DESC
SELECT " "

SELECT * EXCEPT(site_level2, page_chapter1, page_chapter2, rn, zeitraum) FROM SEO_scheduled_queries.top_web_referrer_domains
WHERE zeitraum = "$Zeitraum" AND site_level2 = "$LRA_mapping" AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen" AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
ORDER BY visits DESC

SELECT * EXCEPT(site_level2, page_chapter1, page_chapter2, rn, zeitraum) FROM SEO_scheduled_queries.top_web_traffic_quellen
WHERE zeitraum = "$Zeitraum" AND site_level2 = "$LRA_mapping" AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen" AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
ORDER BY visits DESC
SELECT " "

SELECT * EXCEPT(url_property, rn, zeitraum) FROM SEO_scheduled_queries.top_suchanfragen
WHERE zeitraum = "$Zeitraum" AND url_property = "$Property"
ORDER BY Clicks DESC
SELECT " "

SELECT Clicks, url FROM SEO_scheduled_queries.top_gsc_urls
WHERE zeitraum = "$Zeitraum" AND url_property = "$Property" AND search_type = "ALL"
ORDER BY Clicks DESC
SELECT " "

SELECT Clicks, url FROM SEO_scheduled_queries.top_gsc_urls
WHERE zeitraum = "$Zeitraum" AND url_property = "$Property" AND search_type = "WEB - IMAGE - VIDEO - NEWS"
ORDER BY Clicks DESC

panels.title: Top URLs | Suche (Web, Bilder, Videos & News) | $Zeitraum

targets.rawSql: SELECT " "

SELECT Clicks, url FROM SEO_scheduled_queries.top_gsc_urls
WHERE zeitraum = "$Zeitraum" AND url_property = "$Property" AND search_type = "DISCOVER"
ORDER BY Clicks DESC
SELECT " "

SELECT Clicks, url FROM SEO_scheduled_queries.top_gsc_urls
WHERE zeitraum = "$Zeitraum" AND url_property = "$Property" AND search_type = "GOOGLE_NEWS"
ORDER BY Clicks DESC

query.rawSql:
SELECT a.LRA
FROM (
SELECT "MDR" as LRA
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "NDR"
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "Brisant"
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "KiKA"
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "KiKANiNCHEN"
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "Eurovision"
) as a
ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(a.LRA))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

SELECT DISTINCT url_property FROM $searchconUrlTable
WHERE site_url LIKE '%${LRA_mapping}/%'
AND url_property NOT LIKE 'https://www.mdr.de/%risant%'
AND url_property NOT LIKE '%-hhttps:'
ORDER BY url_property

list.name: Zeitraum
list.query: Letzte 7 Tage, Letzte 28 Tage, Letzte 3 Monate, Letzte 6 Monate

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE
        WHEN "$LRA" = "Brisant" THEN "Brisant"
        WHEN "$LRA" NOT IN ("MDR", "NDR") THEN ""
        ELSE CASE LENGTH("$Property") - LENGTH(REPLACE("$Property", '/', ''))
              WHEN 2 THEN ""
              ELSE SPLIT("$Property", "/")[3]
             END
       END

SELECT CASE
        WHEN "$LRA" = "Brisant" THEN ""
        WHEN "$LRA" NOT IN ("MDR", "NDR") THEN ""
        ELSE CASE LENGTH("$Property") - LENGTH(REPLACE("$Property", '/', ''))
              WHEN 2 THEN ""
              WHEN 3 THEN ""
              ELSE SPLIT("$Property", "/")[4]
             END
       END

SELECT 
  CASE "${LRA:text}"
  WHEN "MDR" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.searchconsole_f.url_impression_mdr_daily"
  WHEN "Brisant" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.searchconsole_f.url_impression_mdr_daily"
  WHEN "KiKA" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.searchconsole_f.url_impression_mdr_daily"
  WHEN "KiKANiNCHEN" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.searchconsole_f.url_impression_mdr_daily"
  WHEN "NDR" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.searchconsole_f.url_impression_ndr_daily"
  WHEN "Eurovision" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.searchconsole_f.url_impression_ndr_daily"
END

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 28 Tage" THEN DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 DAY), INTERVAL 28 DAY)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 3 Monate" THEN DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 DAY), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 6 Monate" THEN DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 DAY), INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
  END

list.description: This data point is also used for GSC time frames, because the data from GSC is always three days old --> the endpoint of the time frame is thereby set by the last available date
list.name: bq_timeframe_end

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE "$LRA"
        WHEN "Brisant" THEN "mdr.de"
        ELSE CONCAT(LOWER("$LRA"),".de")
       END

WITH main_data AS (
SELECT
  CAST(data_date AS STRING) AS data_date,
  SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks,
  SUM(CASE WHEN search_type IN ("WEB", "IMAGE", "VIDEO", "NEWS") THEN clicks ELSE 0 END) AS suche_clicks,
  SUM(CASE WHEN search_type IN ("GOOGLE_NEWS") THEN clicks ELSE 0 END) AS google_news_clicks,
  SUM(CASE WHEN search_type IN ("DISCOVER") THEN clicks ELSE 0 END) AS discover_clicks,
  SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions,
  SUM(CASE WHEN search_type IN ("WEB", "IMAGE", "VIDEO", "NEWS") THEN impressions ELSE 0 END) AS suche_impressions,
  SUM(CASE WHEN search_type IN ("GOOGLE_NEWS") THEN impressions ELSE 0 END) AS google_news_impressions,
  SUM(CASE WHEN search_type IN ("DISCOVER") THEN impressions ELSE 0 END) AS discover_impressions,
  AVG(CTR) AS total_CTR,
  AVG(CASE WHEN search_type IN ("WEB", "IMAGE", "VIDEO", "NEWS") THEN CTR ELSE NULL END) AS suche_CTR,
  AVG(CASE WHEN search_type IN ("GOOGLE_NEWS") THEN CTR ELSE NULL END) AS google_news_CTR,
  AVG(CASE WHEN search_type IN ("DISCOVER") THEN CTR ELSE NULL END) AS discover_CTR,
FROM
  $searchconUrlTable
WHERE url_property = "$Property"
      AND data_date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} 
      AND data_date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
GROUP BY data_date
), input_string AS(
SELECT STRING_AGG(
  FORMAT("(%s|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%.2f|%.2f|%.2f|%.2f)", data_date, total_clicks, suche_clicks, google_news_clicks, discover_clicks, total_impressions, suche_impressions, google_news_impressions, discover_impressions, total_CTR, suche_CTR, google_news_CTR, discover_CTR),
  " -ni- "
) AS final_string
FROM main_data)
SELECT * FROM input_string
